Message:
Big Sis isn’t even a witch...
Why did they capture her?!

She let herself get captured
so I could run away.

Of all the witches captured
by The Inquisition,
not a single one has
ever come back.

They’re all tortured
in the cruelest ways...

and yet I haven’t done
a single thing for you in return...
This can’t be how it ends...

Whenever I was sad
or felt like crying,

I would hug the stuffed
animal Big Sis gave me—

the bear that was filled
with her love and warmth.

...That’s right. She’s always
been the one saving me.

But now it’s my turn
to do the saving.
I’m going to save you, Big Sis...!
